member.summary: Sql Helper for an SQL Server database.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:SqlCE4Umbraco.SqlCEHelper.CreateEmptyDatabase
member.summary: Checks if the actual database exists, if it doesn't then it will create it

member.name: M:SqlCE4Umbraco.SqlCEHelper.ClearDatabase
member.summary: Most likely only will be used for unit tests but will remove all tables from the database

member.name: M:SqlCE4Umbraco.SqlCEHelper.DropForeignKeys(System.String)
member.summary: Drops all foreign keys on a table.
member.remarks: To be used in unit tests.

member.name: M:SqlCE4Umbraco.SqlCEHelper.ReplaceDataDirectory(System.String)
member.summary: Replaces the data directory with a local path.
member.returns: A local path with the resolved 'DataDirectory' mapping.

member.name: M:SqlCE4Umbraco.SqlCEHelper.CreateParameter(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a new parameter for use with this specific implementation of ISqlHelper.
member.returns: A new parameter of the correct type.

member.name: M:SqlCE4Umbraco.SqlCEHelper.ExecuteScalar(System.String,System.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeParameter[])
member.summary: Executes a command that returns a single value.
member.returns: The return value of the command.

member.name: M:SqlCE4Umbraco.SqlCEHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.String,System.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeParameter[])
member.summary: Executes a command and returns the number of rows affected.
member.returns: The number of rows affected by the command.

member.name: M:SqlCE4Umbraco.SqlCEHelper.ExecuteReader(System.String,System.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeParameter[])
member.summary: Executes a command and returns a records reader containing the results.
member.returns: A data reader containing the results of the command.

member.name: T:SqlCE4Umbraco.SqlCEInstaller
member.summary: Database installer for an SQL Server data source.

member.summary: The latest database version this installer supports.

member.name: F:SqlCE4Umbraco.SqlCEInstaller.m_VersionSpecs
member.summary: The specifications to determine the database version.

member.name: P:SqlCE4Umbraco.SqlCEInstaller.CanConnect
member.summary: This ensures that the database exists, then runs the base method

member.name: P:SqlCE4Umbraco.SqlCEInstaller.CanUpgrade
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the installer can upgrade the data source.
member.value: true if the installer can upgrade the data source; otherwise, false.
member.remarks: Empty data sources can't be upgraded, just installed.

member.name: P:SqlCE4Umbraco.SqlCEInstaller.VersionSpecs
member.summary: Gets the version specification for evaluation by DetermineCurrentVersion. Only first matching specification is taken into account.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Returns the sql to do a full install

member.name: P:SqlCE4Umbraco.SqlCEInstaller.UpgradeSql
member.summary: Returns the sql to do an upgrade
